report_reason_title: WHAT DO YOU WANT TO REPORT?
message_delete_hint: Really want to delete this message?
block_dialog_content: After blocking, you will no longer receive messages from ${userName}.
user_blocked_hint: User is blocked, tap to unblock
create_group_select_toast: Please select at least one user
select_at_least_one_member: Please select at least one member
create_group_fail_tips: Failed to create group chat. Please check if the other party has used a client that supports NostrMLS.
no_available_keypackages_content: Not available key packages. Invite your friend(s) to connect?
edit_group_name_not_empty_toast: The group name cannot be empty
remove_member_confirm_content: Are you sure you want to remove {count} member(s) from the group?
no_sessions_description: Your chat list is empty. Connect with friends to start messaging!
find_people_privacy_notice: For privacy, users are hidden. You need an invite link or user ID to connect.
method_2_paste_id: METHOD 2: PASTE INVITE LINK OR ID
enter_user_id: Enter Invite Link or User ID (npub...)
delete_message_me_and_other_action_mode: Request to delete for me and ${otherName}
other_client_keypackages_warning: Warning: These key packages are from other clients. Communication may not work properly.
your_key_package_expired_refresh: Your key package has expired. Would you like to refresh it?
other_user_keypackage_expired: The other user's key package has expired. Please ask them to generate a new key package.
key_package_may_expired: Your key package may have expired. Would you like to refresh it?
key_package_refreshed_retry: Key package refreshed. Please try adding members again.
create_secret_chat_confirm_content: Are you sure you want to start a new private chat and send an invitation to the other person?
delete_group_confirm_content: This action will permanently delete the group and cannot be undone. All group data will be lost.
leave_group_confirm_content: You will no longer receive messages from this group and will need to be re-invited to rejoin.
leave_group_title: Are you sure you want to leave ${chatName}?
leave_and_delete_group_title: Are you sure you want to leave and delete ${chatName}?
delete_self_chat_content: This will delete the chat from your device.
delete_for_me_content: This will only delete the chat from your device. The other person will still have the conversation.
delete_for_all_content: This will attempt to delete the chat for both you and ${userName}. They may not see the messages anymore.
clear_history_content: This action will delete all message history but keep the conversation.
delete_group_content: Deleting this group will remove all members and all messages will be lost. Do you want to delete the group?
leave_group_content: You will no longer receive messages from this group and will need to be re-invited to rejoin.
gift_wrapped_message_warning: This message is not a gift-wrapped message.
not_allowed_push_own_detail: Not allowed push own detail page
invite_private_chat: ${userName} invite you to join the private chat
invite_private_group: ${userName} invite you to join the private group
private_chat_created: Messages and calls are end-to-end encrypted. Only people in this chat can read.
private_group_created: Messages are end-to-end encrypted. Only people in this chat can read.
self_chat_created: You can add notes for yourself in this chat. Notes are end-to-end encrypted and saved locally.
removed_from_group: You have been removed from the group
tech_intro_content_1: üîí Think of your messages as letters in sealed envelopes. Only you and your friend have the keys to open them - not even the mailroom can peek inside.
tech_intro_content_2: üì¨ You choose your own mailroom (relay). Unlike big tech companies, you can switch mailrooms anytime or even run your own - no snooping allowed.
tech_intro_content_3: üîë You hold the only keys to your account. It's like having a personal safe that only you can unlock - complete privacy and control.
tech_intro_feature_1_desc: Your messages are sealed before leaving your phone - only your friend can open them
tech_intro_feature_2_desc: No tech giant controls your messages - you pick where they're stored
tech_intro_feature_3_desc: Even if someone steals your phone, your old messages stay locked and safe
tech_intro_feature_4_desc: Photos and files are locked before sending - servers can't see what's inside
tech_intro_delete_1_desc: Removes the message from your phone only
tech_intro_delete_2_desc: Deletes from your phone and asks your friend to delete it too
tech_intro_delete_3_desc: Group admin can delete and ask everyone to remove the message
tech_intro_delete_4_desc: Group admin can close the group and ask everyone to delete the chat
click_to_send_message_to_yourself: Click to send message to yourself
welcome_description: You've joined XChat. Here, communication is free, private, and truly yours.
public_identity_description: This is your ID(npub...). It's like your username. Share this freely so friends can identify you.
secret_key_description: CRITICAL: This is your Private Key. It controls your account. Never share this with anyone, not even us.
start_connecting_description: You're all set! Your cryptographic identity is ready. Share your invite link to your friends to start chatting securely.
invite_friends_hint: You can always find this in "Invite Friends"
unknown_message_hint: This is an unknown message type. Please update your client to view it.
